verbs.description: [ARG0: French President Emmanuel Macron and President Donald Trump] [V: called] [ARG1: for a “ new deal ” on Iran ’s nuclear weapons program] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] ; [ARGM-ADV: sending ...]
French President Emmanuel Macron and President Donald Trump called for a “ new deal ” on Iran ’s nuclear weapons program Tuesday ; [V: sending] ...
